feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for QR codes not appearing on PDF
  • Revert Nordigen PR
  • v5.11.19 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10506

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.18...v5.11.19
